thread.title: MDU Resources Announces Webcast of Analyst Conference Call

author: cnbc.com
title: MDU Resources Announces Webcast of Analyst Conference Call
text:
BISMARCK, N.D., April 3, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- MDU Resources Group, Inc. (NYSE: MDU) will webcast its first quarter 2018 earnings conference call May 3 following the release of its financial results.
The webcast will begin at 2 p.m. EDT and can be accessed at www.mdu.com . Audio and webcast replays will be available. Audio will be available through May 17 at 855-859-2056, or 404-537-3406 for international callers, conference ID 5478625.
MDU Resources Group, Inc., a member of the S&P MidCap 400 index and the S&P High-Yield Dividend Aristocrats index, is Building a Strong AmericaÂ® by providing essential products and services through its regulated energy delivery and construction materials and services businesses. For more information about MDU Resources, see the company's website at www.mdu.com or contact the Investor Relations Department at investor@mduresources.com .
Financial C ontact: Jason Vollmer, vice president, chief financial officer and treasurer, 701-530-1755
Media Contact: Laura Lueder, manager of communications and public affairs, 701-530-1095
View original content with multimedia: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/mdu-resources-announces-webcast-of-analyst-conference-call-300623509.html
SOURCE MDU Resources Group, Inc.
